009package Ch03_Point_Operations;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.ImageStack;
014import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
015import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
016import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
017import imagingbook.common.histogram.HistogramPlot;
018import imagingbook.common.histogram.HistogramUtils;
019import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
020import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
021
022import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
023
024/**
025 * <p>
026 * ImageJ plugin, matches the histograms of the supplied images which are supplied as a {@link ImageStack} with 2 ore
027 * more frames. The first image of this stack is used as the reference image, i.e., its cumulative histogram is used to
028 * calculate the intensity transformation for the remaining images. See Sec. 3.6.4 (Fig. 3.17) of [1] for additional
029 * details. The plugin displays the modified images as a new image stack. Optionally, the original histograms, the
030 * associated modified histograms and cumulative histograms are shown (again as image stacks). Note that all modified
031 * cumulative histograms should be very similar.
032 * </p>
033 * <p>
034 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
035 * (2022).
036 * </p>
037 *
038 * @author WB
039 * @see HistogramPlot
040 * @see HistogramUtils
041 */
042public class Match_Reference_Histogram_Stack implements PlugInFilter {
043
044        private static boolean ShowOriginalHistograms = true;
045        private static boolean ShowModifiedHistograms = true;
046        private static boolean ShowModifiedCumulativeHistograms = false;
047
048        private ImagePlus im;   // reference image (selected interactively)
049
050        /** Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open. */
051        public Match_Reference_Histogram_Stack() {
052                if (noCurrentImage()) {
053                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.CityscapeSmallStack);
054                }
055        }
056
057        @Override
058        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
059                this.im = im;
060                return DOES_8G + STACK_REQUIRED + NO_CHANGES;
061        }
062        
063        @Override
064        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
065                ImageStack origImageStack = im.getStack();
066                int n = origImageStack.getSize();
067                if (n < 2) {
068                        IJ.error("Plugin requires stack with at least 2 slices!");
069                        return;
070                }
071
072                if (!runDialog()) // select the reference image
073                        return;
074
075                // get all histograms:
076                int[][] histograms = new int[n][];
077                for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
078                        ImageProcessor ipA = origImageStack.getProcessor(i + 1);
079                        histograms[i] = ipA.getHistogram();
080                }
081                // first image specifies the reference histogram:
082                int[] hRef = histograms[0];
083
084                // adapt remaining images to the reference histogram:
085                ImageStack modImageStack = new ImageStack();
086                modImageStack.addSlice(origImageStack.getProcessor(1).duplicate());
087                for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {
088                        int[] hA = histograms[i];
089                        int[] f = HistogramUtils.matchHistograms(hA, hRef);
090                        ImageProcessor ipA = origImageStack.getProcessor(i + 1).duplicate();
091                        ipA.applyTable(f);
092                        modImageStack.addSlice(ipA);
093                }
094                new ImagePlus("Modified images", modImageStack).show();
095
096                if (ShowOriginalHistograms) {
097                        ImageStack origHistStack = new ImageStack();
098                        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
099                                HistogramPlot plot = new HistogramPlot(histograms[i], null);
100                                origHistStack.addSlice(plot.getProcessor());
101                        }
102                        new ImagePlus("Original histograms", origHistStack).show();
103                }
104
105                if (ShowModifiedHistograms) {
106                        ImageStack modHistStack = new ImageStack();
107                        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
108                                ImageProcessor ipAm = modImageStack.getProcessor(i + 1);
109                                int[] h = ipAm.getHistogram();
110                                modHistStack.addSlice(new HistogramPlot(h, null).getProcessor());
111                        }
112                        new ImagePlus("Modified histograms", modHistStack).show();
113                }
114
115                if (ShowModifiedCumulativeHistograms) {
116                        ImageStack modCumHistStack = new ImageStack();
117                        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
118                                ImageProcessor ipA = modImageStack.getProcessor(i + 1);
119                                int[] h = ipA.getHistogram();
120                                modCumHistStack.addSlice(new HistogramPlot(HistogramUtils.cdf(h), null).getProcessor());
121                        }
122                        new ImagePlus("Modified cumulative histograms", modCumHistStack).show();
123                }
124        }
125
126        private boolean runDialog() {
127                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
128                gd.addCheckbox("Show original histograms", ShowOriginalHistograms);
129
130                gd.addCheckbox("Show modified histograms", ShowModifiedHistograms);
131                gd.addCheckbox("Show modified cum. histograms", ShowModifiedCumulativeHistograms);
132
133                gd.showDialog();
134                if(gd.wasCanceled())
135                        return false;
136
137                ShowOriginalHistograms = gd.getNextBoolean();
138                ShowModifiedHistograms = gd.getNextBoolean();
139                ShowModifiedCumulativeHistograms = gd.getNextBoolean();
140                return true;
141        }
142
143}
144
